column4: am I wrong in saying that ubuntu is debian with shorter release cycles?
whats in it for the company sponsoring ubuntu?
cascade or something
why are they sponsoring ubuntu and debian?
only ubuntu
not debian
that doesn't mean they sponsor debian
IBM, Red Hat, Novell, all those companies pay people to work on linux, but that doesn't mean they sponsor it
they "advocate" it
but not sponsor the same way Canonical sponsors ubuntu
lol
that was just an example, lol
Ubuntu is GPL. and if they make it closed-source, it'll be forked most likely
theres actually an Ubuntu media center edition on the way
is it for xbox?
no, just a general media center edition
for whatever
isnt ubuntu a good enough media center already for the pc?
its not ubuntu for a specifc device. its ubuntu with certain things pre-installed, i.e. MythTV, etc
yes
okay... :) can you guess what my next question will be?
i think so
i know :)
